thread.title: Sweet Suites!
thread.title_full: Sweet Suites! - Review of Hotel on Rivington, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aegean777
title: Sweet Suites!
text: This is a great place to stay when in NYC, from it's contemporary design, great views of the city and best of all the staff treats you like royalty! Juliette was an absolute doll to me! It's the nice little touches that make your stay great - a complementary glass of wine, free wifi, even warm cookies brought up to your room. The units are VERY clean, and the soaking tub was so relaxing especially after a stressful business trip, the beds are firm but comfortable, you can go wrong with memory foam! I would definitely stay again! I highly recommend this hotelâ€¦.and I am very picky!
